original_text: But if God so clothes the grass of the field, which today is alive and tomorrow is thrown into the oven, will he not much more clothe you, O you of little faith?
korean_text: 오늘 있다가 내일 아궁이에 던져지는 들풀도 하나님이 이렇게 입히시거든 하물며 너희일까보냐 믿음이 작은 자들아

sentences.original_text: But if God so clothes the grass of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님이 들의 풀을 이처럼 입히시면

sentences.original_text: and tomorrow is thrown into the oven
will he not much more clothe you
